original_title: Teamster Boss: The Jackie Presser Story
overview: For a generation, the mobs main money machine was the Teamsters Union. When Jimmy Hoffa disappeared, the fight was on to see who could follow him. Jackie Presser was the son of a long time union board member and when he retired, Jackie was elevated to one of the most powerful position in the country; President of the Teamsters Union.
title: Teamster Boss: The Jackie Presser Story
